title: Shares of Asian automakers tumble as US announces tariffs on Mexico

title: Chinese factory activity contracts more than expected, official data show
text: China’s National Bureau of Statistics released official manufacturing PMI for the month of May, which fell to 49.4 from 50.1 in April. Analysts polled by Reuters had expected the indicator to drop to 49.9 in May.

title: Harvard study: People who use dating apps such as Tinder are more likely to have eating disorders

title: Major Hollywood studios may reconsider Georgia business over abortion law
